page.title: 08ARTS AND CRAFTS.
page.content: In 1979 the first major exibition by artists of Victorian era who made Newlyn famous held at Newlyn's Orion Gallery. This year another exibition was mounted. This featured work carried out between the years 1900-1930. this is a touring exibition and moves into Plymouth ,The Barbican in London and to Birmingham. In conjunction with this Television South West made a film about the artists. One of the artists Ernest Procter did work on several church interiors one of which was St. Mary's in Penzanc. Unfortunately a fire destroyed this piece of work earlier this year(1985).
